settings.destini_intro_text:
Enter your zip code to find Richard’s Rainwater in over 2,000 grocery stores!

Prefer Grocery Delivery? Click the “Buy Online” button.

settings.text: Purchase a bottle or can of Richard’s at your local retailer.
Text us a picture of your receipt.
We’ll Venmo or PayPal you cash back within 24 hours.

settings.aisle_heading: Can we buy you a drink?
settings.aisle_intro_text: Enter your phone number, purchase a single bottle or can of Richard’s at your local retailer and we’ll Venmo or Paypal you back for the cost of one.
settings.fine_print: I agree to receive recurring automated marketing text messages (e.g. cart reminders) at the phone number provided. Consent is not a condition to purchase. Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help and STOP to cancel. View our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
